verifyWalletDescription: Please sign a message to verify your ownership of the wallet. This will not incur any cost.
verifiedWalletDescription: Your wallet has been verified. Please next to continue.
verifyWalletMessage: Make sure the message starts with "Sign this message to attach your wallet to your Lemonade account..."
noTokensFoundsDescription: We could not find the necessary tokens in your wallet. Try switching to a different wallet to verify ownership.
